exception.name: ErrorParameterMismatch
exception.description: This exception is thrown if there is a mismatch regarding the particular parameters that have been provided in the context of the export of stored data.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorParameterMismatch that is thrown if there is a mismatch regarding the particular parameters that have been provided in the context of the export of stored data.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when export parameters are incompatible or contradictory
specification.applicability: Data export operations with filtering parameters
